text: No muri uyo muriro udahera bazokoma yo induru muri uyo muriro udahera bavuga bati:- Muremyi wacu, dukure muri uyu muriro udahera tugire ibikorwa vyiza bitameze nk’ivyo twahora tugira tukiri kw’Isi, mbega ntitwabahaye ubuzima bw’ukwibuka uwibuka, nugushikirwa nuwutuza, rero nimuhonje ibihano mwebwe mwahemukiye imitima yanyu kuko mudafise uwuzoba rokora
